author: Anonymous Helix
title: Office Hours During Reading Break
question: I know that the TA office hours will not be available, but will the professor office hours be available during the upcoming reading break?
student_answer: I don’t think so because for one week university will be closed and professor are also on holidays. But, I am not sure.
instructor_answer: Over the next few days, various TA office hours will either be confirmed as scheduled or cancelled, as seen in the Reading Break column of @9, dependent on the office hour. Check @9 for these updates.
